statements: UPDATE social_media_analytics SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = '8efb5b95-0760-4d8c-b04f-4c92c61db6b9';
UPDATE social_media_analytics SET comments = 50, shares = 25 WHERE post_id = '4c1574fa-b0de-467d-93a5-50afc9defd0b';
UPDATE social_media_analytics SET likes = 100, comments = 50 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE social_media_analytics SET shares = 200, likes = 150, post_date = '2022-04-15 18:30' WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = 1000, following_count = 500 WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE post_analytics SET likes_count = 500, comments_count = 100, post_date = '2021-09-15 10:00:00' WHERE post_id = 456;
UPDATE social_media_users SET followers_count = followers_count + 1, following_count = following_count - 1 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE post_analytics SET likes_count = likes_count * 2, comments_count = comments_count / 2 WHERE post_id = 54321;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET likes = 100, comments = 20, shares = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_analytics SET total_likes = 500, total_comments = 100, total_shares = 50 WHERE user_id = 5;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE post_history SET engagement_rate = 0.75, impressions = 1500 WHERE post_id = 5;
UPDATE social_media_data SET likes_count = 100 WHERE id = 101;
UPDATE performance_metrics SET engagement_rate = 0.75, impressions = 5000 WHERE metric_id = 201;
UPDATE social_media_data SET likes_count = 100, comments_count = 50 WHERE id = 12345;
UPDATE user_details SET bio = 'Passionate about technology' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE analytics_data SET likes = 100, comments = 20 WHERE user_id = 123 AND post_id = 456;
UPDATE post_details SET post_content = 'Updated post content', location = 'New York' WHERE post_id = 789 AND user_id = 456;
UPDATE analytics_data SET likes = 50, impressions = 100 WHERE user_id = 123 AND post_id = 456;
UPDATE user_details SET followers = followers + 10, following = following - 5 WHERE user_id = 789;
